description: Welcome to this bright and spacious 3 Bedroom 4 Bathroom Corner Unit with a Bonus Recreation Room in the basement, perfect for a home office, gym, or extra living space. A detached single garage provides secure parking and additional storage.  Enjoy the huge savings of NO STRATA FEES, making this an incredible opportunity for families, first-time buyers, downsizers, or investors. Recently renovated with new carpets, fresh paint, and updated flooring, this home is move-in ready ! Located in a desirable neighborhood, this is a rare find—don’t miss out !
